name: Zoomies! Cat Racing
description:
Zoomies! Cat Racing is currently being developed into a full game! Follow Scarlet Games for updates!

--

Made within 1 week for Whisker Jam 2022!

Race through the city streets against up to 9 other cats. Drift through tight alleyways to claim first place! You can use either keyboard/mouse or joypad!

Choose from 3 breeds of cat, all with their own stats!

Note: As this game was created within 1 week by 1 developer, bugs and unforeseen issues are expected.

Known issues:

  • Big crashes into lamposts and walls can force the player to fall through the floor. If this happens, just press the reset button.
  • AI can sometimes experience the above issue, but are unable to reset and will be missing from the race.
  • There is no pause menu during the race.
  • Joypad support in the main menu is a little buggy. Consider using a mouse for this.
  • The AI are sometimes a little too unforgiving on easier difficulties.
  • The game size is over 1GB which is a little too big for what it is. Will try to reduce this in future.

Thanks to Whisker Games for hosting Whisker Jam 2022!
